Repos.name: LLVMRace
Repos.cmd: git clone git@github.com:coderrect/LLVMRace.git && cd LLVMRace && git checkout release-vVERSION && git pull && git checkout master && git merge --no-ff release-vVERSION -m 'merge release-vVERSION automatically by tool.' && git pull && git push
